content.raw:
with the changes lyse doesn't start anymore I'm getting:

```
#!python
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/anaconda/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 174, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", fname, loader, pkg_name)
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/anaconda/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 72, in _run_code
    exec code in run_globals
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/labscript_suite/lyse/__main__.py", line 1835, in <module>
    app = Lyse()
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/labscript_suite/lyse/__main__.py", line 1770, in __init__
    self, to_singleshot, from_singleshot, self.output_box.port)
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/labscript_suite/lyse/__main__.py", line 415, in __init__
    self.header = HorizontalHeaderViewWithWidgets(self.model)
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/labscript_suite/labscript_utils/qtwidgets/headerview_with_widgets.py", line 43, in __init__
    self.setSectionsMovable(True)
TypeError: setMovable(self, bool): first argument of unbound method must have type 'QHeaderView'
```

I think thats why I had defined the functions in my original version of qt.py

Update: I'll replace the new_func = old_func with setattr as that fixes it

Update2: fixed it! It would be great if you fixed it in the zip you posted earlier too

with the changes lyse doesn't start anymore I'm getting:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/janwerkmann/anaconda/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 174, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", fname, loader, pkg_name)

I think thats why I had defined the functions in my original version of qt.py

Update: I'll replace the new_func = old_func with setattr as that fixes it

Update2: fixed it! It would be great if you fixed it in the zip you posted earlier too
